title: Unfair server ranked loss with no loss prevented
body: Just writing to express my disappointment. Our entire team just got disconnected in a ranked game due to server issues and unfairly lost LP as a result of them being able to win freely. :({{item:3070}}  How is this?

replies.body: Over the past few days there have been some problems with Riot's OCE servers. I'd just try to avoid playing ranked for a while until they sort it out completely.
